content.rendered:
Directed by Ovais Khan

Written by Abir Sengupta

Cast Prateik Babbar (Rohit Bajaj (as Prateik)). Ishita Raj (Zoya). Siddhant Kapoor (Sahil Qureshi (as Siddhanth Kapoor)) . Poonam Jheelan (Avantika). Anita Raj (Vijeta Bajaj). Subha Rajput (Meera). Natasa Stankovic (Dancer in song Baby Mera). Natasha Stankovic (Dancer in song Baby Mera). Dalip Tahil (Sangarsh Bajaj)

Languages Hindi

Producers Syed Imran Ali. Deepak Mulchandani. Karan Mulchandani. Veejay Mulchandani. Rohit Nag. Jitendra Kumar Singh. Kunal Thakur. Navneet Tiwari

Production Yashvvi Film
